title: spec: inconsistent description in "Qualified identifiers" section
body:
by **dmitrymaluka**: 
This grammar rule implies that "qualifier identifier" actually means
"optionally qualified identifier":

  QualifiedIdent = [ PackageName "." ] identifier .

especially together with a rule from previous section:

  Operand = Literal | QualifiedIdent | MethodExpr | "(" Expression ")" .

But the next paragraph contradicts it implying that we are talking about qualified
identifiers only:

  "A qualified identifier accesses an identifier in a different package, which must be imported."

In other words, the usage of unqualified identifiers in expressions is not mentioned at
all (apart from the brackets in QualifiedIdent rule).
